title: How BMC can be the ‘orchestrator of orchestrators’ for enterprise agentic AI
optimized_headline: BMC's Role as the Key Orchestrator for Enterprise AI Solutions Revealed

raw_body:
Agentic AI is, in the opinion of McKinsey, the way to ‘break out of the gen AI paradox.’  Nearly four in five companies are using generative AI, according to the consultancy giant’s research, but comparatively few are getting any bottom-line value from it. The answer to the question of value, therefore, may be in orchestration. […]
The post How BMC can be the ‘orchestrator of orchestrators’ for enterprise agentic AI appeared first on AI News.
speedrun: BMC is positioning itself as a key player in the field of agentic AI, which McKinsey suggests could unlock real value from generative AI. Despite nearly 80% of companies using generative AI, many struggle to see financial benefits. BMC aims to act as the 'orchestrator of orchestrators,' potentially streamlining the integration and effectiveness of AI tools. This approach is crucial now as businesses seek tangible returns on their AI investments.
why_it_matters: Companies using generative AI could find new ways to enhance productivity and profitability through better orchestration of AI tools.
This shift towards agentic AI reflects a broader trend in the market, where businesses are increasingly focused on maximizing the value from their AI investments.

lenses.eli12: Agentic AI is like a conductor for an orchestra, ensuring that all musicians play in harmony. BMC wants to be that conductor for businesses using AI, helping them work together effectively. This matters because it could help companies finally see the benefits of their AI efforts, leading to better products and services for everyone.
lenses.pm: For product managers, BMC's focus on agentic AI highlights a growing need for efficient integration of AI tools. This could lead to cost savings and improved user experiences. Understanding how to orchestrate these tools effectively could be key to delivering value and staying competitive in the market.
lenses.engineer: From a technical perspective, BMC's orchestration approach could enhance the performance of generative AI models by ensuring they work together seamlessly. This could lead to improved outcomes, as companies leverage multiple AI systems effectively. However, the challenge remains in implementing these orchestration strategies without disrupting existing workflows.
